NK051(zhi)003:1: // mtshan brjod 'grel pa nyi zla 'bar ba'i sgron me'i lo rgyus khog dbub bsdus don bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)003:2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i lo rgyus sam /
NK051(zhi)003:3: 'grel pa rin po che gsal bar byed pa'i sgron
NK051(zhi)003:4: me 'bar ba zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste
NK051(zhi)003:5: / de yang theg pa thams cad kyi spyi rje /
NK051(zhi)003:6: dgongs pa thams cad kyi zhe phugs /
NK051(zhi)003:7: mdo rgyud thams cad kyi spyi phud /
NK051(zhi)003:8: theg pa thams cad kyi sgo 'byed pa'i lde mig /
NK051(zhi)003:9: chos sku dang sangs rgyas dngos su ston pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:10: 'di la bshad lugs rnam pa bzhis bstan pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:11: nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te /
NK051(zhi)003:12: don gyi khog dbub pa dang gcig /
NK051(zhi)003:13: sa gzhi lta bu'i dpes mtshon te /
NK051(zhi)003:14: chos thams cad kyi bca' gzhi bstan pa dang gnyis //
NK051(zhi)003:15: nyi zla lta bu'i dpes mtshon te /
NK051(zhi)003:16: theg pa thams cad gsal bar bshad pa dang gsum /
NK051(zhi)003:17: nyi ma'i snying po'i dpes mtshon te /
NK051(zhi)003:18: chos thams cad snying po gcig tu 'dus par bstan pa dang bzhi'o //
NK051(zhi)003:20: rgyud snyan brgyud kyis khog phub pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:21: sbas pa gter gyi lo rgyus kyis khog phub pa dang gnyis las /
NK051(zhi)003:22: dang po skye ba med pa'i dbyings /
NK051(zhi)003:24: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i gnas nas /
NK051(zhi)003:25: ye thog ma'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba kun tu bzang pos byin gyi rlabs kyis bshad pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:26: gnas gsal dag rin chen sna lnga las grub pa'i
NK051(zhi)003:27: 'ja' tshon sna lnga phyogs bcur 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK051(zhi)003:28: du / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la tshig dang yi ges ma bshad /
NK051(zhi)003:30: des o rgyan d+ha na ko sha'i gling du /
NK051(zhi)003:31: gu ru dga' rab rdo rje la rang gi ngo bos bshad /
NK051(zhi)003:32: des bde ldan bkra shis brag tu /
NK051(zhi)003:33: gu ru 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la bshad /
NK051(zhi)003:34: des rgya gar rdo rje gdan du /
NK051(zhi)003:35: gu ru sh+r+ai sid+ha la bshad /
NK051(zhi)003:36: des o rgyan yul gyi mtsho dkyil du pad+ma'i sdong po la /
NK051(zhi)003:37: pha med ma med sku 'khrungs sprul pa'i sku pad+ma sam b+ha wa la bshad /
NK051(zhi)003:38: de ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku ste 'pho 'gyur med /
NK051(zhi)003:39: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab /
NK051(zhi)003:40: skal ldan kun la dgos 'dod char ltar 'bebs /
NK051(zhi)003:41: gu ru de'i sku che ba'i yon tan ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
NK051(zhi)003:43: rgyal po gcig gdung chad pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:48: bu de'i phrag pa la sbrang bu gcig 'dug pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:49: gu rus sor rdo gcig rgyab tsa na byis pa shi /
NK051(zhi)003:50: de nas rgyal pos kun sbran te /
NK051(zhi)003:51: rgya gar ka ma la'i nags tshal phu ru spyugs pas /
NK051(zhi)003:54: srin po sh+aan+ta rak+shi bya bar btags te /
NK051(zhi)003:55: der yul mi la gros byas te /
NK051(zhi)003:57: shing mang po bcer te gson bsreg byas te /
NK051(zhi)003:58: zhag gsum na bltas tsa na /
NK051(zhi)003:59: pad+ma'i sdong po chen po zhig gi dkyil na /
NK051(zhi)003:60: sku grang grang bsil bsil 'dra bar 'dug ste //
NK051(zhi)003:62: pad+ma sam b+ha wa bya bar btags so //
NK051(zhi)003:63: yang na ni nags kyi phu na yod tsa na /
NK051(zhi)003:64: na ning gi mi de yang 'dug na zer te /
NK051(zhi)003:65: yang bzung ste chu 'bab pa la bskur /
NK051(zhi)003:66: zhag gsum na bltas tsa na /
NK051(zhi)003:67: gu ru chab kyis ma gsher bar skam seng 'dug pas /
NK051(zhi)003:68: de'i dus su mtsho skyes rdo rjer btags so //
NK051(zhi)003:69: yang yul gang g+ha bya bar phyin pas /
NK051(zhi)003:71: gyad rtsal can mang pos mtshon cha mang pos ma phug ste /
NK051(zhi)003:73: rdo rje rgya gram zhu blugs su gon 'dug /
NK051(zhi)003:74: rdo rje'i phreng ba dbu la bcings pa mthong ste /
NK051(zhi)003:75: de'i dus su rdo rje thod phreng bya bar btags so //
NK051(zhi)003:76: nga la bu chung tsam na rgyal bu dge ba bya bar btags so //
NK051(zhi)003:79: nga la mthu rtsal shugs dang ldan pas /
NK051(zhi)003:80: sh+aakya seng ge bya bar btags so //
NK051(zhi)003:81: de ltar mi chos tsam gyis mtshan bzhi /
NK051(zhi)003:82: nus pa skyes pa'i mtshan bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)003:84: de nas gu ru pad mas /
NK051(zhi)003:85: a su ra'i brag phug tu sgrub pa mdzad pas /
NK051(zhi)003:86: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhal dngos su gzigs so //
NK051(zhi)003:88: 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel
NK051(zhi)003:89: pa nyi zla 'bar ba'i sgron ma 'di mdzad do
NK051(zhi)003:90: // sgrub thabs man ngag yig sna ma lus pa mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)003:92: bod yul gyi dbus na mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyis /
NK051(zhi)003:93: stag gi lo la bsam yas 'gram btsugs pas /
NK051(zhi)003:94: 'jig rten gyi lha ma srin mi bsrun pas /
NK051(zhi)003:97: mtha'i ban+de rgad po dge mthong bya ba la /
NK051(zhi)003:100: drag rtsal dang mthu su che byas pas /
NK051(zhi)003:104: gu ru pad+ma sam b+ha wa che'o zer /
NK051(zhi)003:105: rje yis da lta gang na bzhugs byas pas /
NK051(zhi)003:106: rgya gar o rgyan yul na bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)003:111: slob dpon pad+ma a su ra'i brag phug na /
NK051(zhi)003:112: dgongs pa mdzad pa'i nyams su shar nas /
NK051(zhi)003:113: rje'i bka' dbang che bas ban+de bang chen la btang pa yin /
NK051(zhi)003:115: lam khar sdug bsngal gcan 'phrang bsrung mis gser la bltas nas gsod /
NK051(zhi)003:120: rgyud 'grel man ngag dang bcas pa ma lus pa bsnams nas /
NK051(zhi)003:122: rdzu 'phrul gyi rta la chibs nas byon pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:123: gtsang du bang chen pa 'phrad nas /
NK051(zhi)003:124: khyod tsho sngon la song dang /
NK051(zhi)003:125: gu ru 'ong gis log cig byas tsa na /
NK051(zhi)003:127: gu rus sngon la byon nas der rje dang mjal /
NK051(zhi)003:131: a su ra'i brag phug nas /
NK051(zhi)003:132: bswe'i lha mo bzhi dam la btags /
NK051(zhi)003:133: chos skyong dam can bran bzhin du 'khor gyin mchis so //
NK051(zhi)003:134: der slob dpon gyis 'jig rten gyi lha ma srin btul nas dam la btags /
NK051(zhi)003:135: gangs kar sha med ma ma thul ba yang thul /
NK051(zhi)003:136: sa bdag dang lha ma srin gyis grogs byas nas mod la bzhengs so //
NK051(zhi)003:137: rta'i lo yan chod kyis zin no //
NK051(zhi)003:138: de nas gu rus yon tan zad pa med pa mkhyen pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:139: rab gnas bye ma las mdzad do //
NK051(zhi)003:142: lo ts+aa ba ska cog gnyis kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab ste /
NK051(zhi)003:143: lta ba thams cad kyi rgyud che ba rang la gnas pa /
NK051(zhi)003:144: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyud /
NK051(zhi)003:145: phrin las kyi rgyud skabs sbyor bdun pa /
NK051(zhi)003:146: spyod pa'i rgyud brtson pa don ldan /
NK051(zhi)003:147: dam tshig gi rgyud sa ma ya bsdus pa /
NK051(zhi)003:148: dbang gi rgyud dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud dang drug bshad do //
NK051(zhi)003:149: skad cig gis 'tshang rgya ba'i rdzogs chen dang bcas pa mkhyen pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:150: de tsho'i nang nas kyang theg pa dgu'i yang rtse spyi ti bshad do //
NK051(zhi)003:151: de nas bde ldan gyi brag la /
NK051(zhi)003:152: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis /
NK051(zhi)003:153: 'jam dpal gshin rje tshe bdag bsgrubs pas /
NK051(zhi)003:155: yi dam lhas lung bstan pa /
NK051(zhi)003:157: rgya gar gyi yul dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nags tshal mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas na /
NK051(zhi)003:158: bse sgrom smug po'i nang na /
NK051(zhi)003:159: 'jam dpal le'u khri phrag drug khri drug stong yod kyi /
NK051(zhi)003:160: der khyod song la mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma 'bul /
NK051(zhi)003:162: de nas thon na 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub thob bo //
NK051(zhi)003:164: de nas gu ru 'jam dpal bshes gnyen dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du byon nas /
NK051(zhi)003:165: mkha' 'gro ma la tshogs gtor btang gsol ba btab /
NK051(zhi)003:166: man+dala phul te dngos grub zhu 'tshal byas pas /
NK051(zhi)003:168: rnal 'byor pa khyed dngos grub ci 'dod zer te /
NK051(zhi)003:169: der gu rus 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i rgyud zhu 'tshal byas pas /
NK051(zhi)003:171: 'jam dpal gyi rgyud le'u khri phrag drug khri drug stong bzhugs te /
NK051(zhi)003:172: rgyud yo bton na bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' chad dang /
NK051(zhi)003:173: thugs kyis bor ba 'ong ste mi rung bas /
NK051(zhi)003:174: rnal 'byor pa bse sgrom kha ma phye bar /
NK051(zhi)003:176: ci tsam ran pa zhig khyer cig /
NK051(zhi)003:177: thon cig ces bka' yis gnang ngo //
NK051(zhi)003:178: de nas gu rus rin po ches shel gyi gzong gis /
NK051(zhi)003:179: bse sgrom khol bton nas ran tsam zhig bde ldan brag la khyer te /
NK051(zhi)003:180: gtor ma btang ste gzigs tsa na /
NK051(zhi)003:181: rgya skad nas le'u lnga yar lus pa'i /
NK051(zhi)003:182: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)003:183: zhes pa nas bzung ba'i 'jam dpal mtshan brjod rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)003:184: 'jam dpal ye shes rgyan rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)003:185: 'jam dpal nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud dang /
NK051(zhi)003:192: las tig gsang ba drug cu pa 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgyur ro //
NK051(zhi)003:193: gu ru des de ltar 'phags pa 'jam dpal bsgrub pas 'grub ste /
NK051(zhi)003:194: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob bo //
NK051(zhi)003:196: rgya gar rdo rje gdan du sh+r+ai sing ha la sde tshang bar bshad do //
NK051(zhi)003:197: des o rgyan gyi yul du /
NK051(zhi)003:199: pha med ma med skyes te sprul pa'i sku des /
NK051(zhi)003:200: bsam yas su snod dang skal bar ldan pa'i skyes bu ni ma rnyed /
NK051(zhi)003:202: da nga'i man ngag dang chos 'di tsho gter du sba dgongs nas /
NK051(zhi)003:203: nub gcig mchims phu'i gnas su /
NK051(zhi)003:204: rje mnga' bdag dang gros mdzad pas slob dpon gyi zhal nas /
NK051(zhi)003:206: bdag gis man ngag snying dang 'dra ba 'di rnams gtad pa'i skal ldan ma rnyed pas /
NK051(zhi)003:207: da lta dus bzang khrims che yang /
NK051(zhi)003:208: tha ma dus spyod kyang je ngan mchi /
NK051(zhi)003:209: rje'i bka' khrims kyang nub ste mchi /
NK051(zhi)003:210: rgya dang bod du so mtshams chad /
NK051(zhi)003:211: sngags dang rgyud sde ni bod kyis dkrugs /
NK051(zhi)003:213: sde 'khrugs dang dam pa'i chos la ni blud ma 'bebs /
NK051(zhi)003:214: bod ban dam tshig med pa rnams la bshad na /
NK051(zhi)003:215: tshor ngas che la sun rkyen /
NK051(zhi)003:216: lag pa dam la g.yo sgyu ngo dgas chos 'brel 'brel nas slob dpon spangs nas /
NK051(zhi)003:219: rang la rtogs pa ma skyes par /
NK051(zhi)003:222: tshig la don med mun nag tho yor mkhan /
NK051(zhi)003:223: nag po kha 'byams ngo dag'i gang zag la /
NK051(zhi)003:224: spel ba'i gnas med par gter du sbos gsungs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:225: mtha' 'dul gyi gtsug lag khang bzhir /
NK051(zhi)003:227: ru non gyi gtsug lag khang bzhir gter phran bzhi sbas so //
NK051(zhi)003:228: spyi ti 'di gdams pa phyi nang gsang ba ma bu dang bcas pa rnams /
NK051(zhi)003:229: bse sgrom nang du gser gyis rgyas btab nas gu rus rgyang ro tshal ma'i brag la bsnams nas /
NK051(zhi)003:232: skar ma rgyal gyi nyin mo /
NK051(zhi)003:234: pad+ma bdag ni brag btsan khyod la gtad /
NK051(zhi)003:235: nam zhig skal ldan byung na rgya 'di khyod khrol cig /
NK051(zhi)003:236: gsungs nas brag phug rang 'khrungs su sbas so //
NK051(zhi)003:237: pad+ma bdag gi smon lam mthu btsan na //
NK051(zhi)003:238: nam zhig skal ldan gcig dag phrad par shog /
NK051(zhi)003:240: de nas zhu yas ban chung bde ba bya ba
NK051(zhi)003:241: rgyang ro tshal ma'i brag la sgrub pa byed pa'i
NK051(zhi)003:243: gter chos zab rgyas 'dug pa gzigs nas /
NK051(zhi)003:244: mtshan brjod 'grel pa gsal bar byed pa'i sgron ma 'di thon no //
NK051(zhi)003:251: sngon tshe gong nas bskal par sbyangs pa yis //
NK051(zhi)003:252: theg pa thams cad 'di ru 'dus par bstan //
NK051(zhi)003:253: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)003:256: nyon mongs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por /
NK051(zhi)003:257: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bka' stsal pa yang /
NK051(zhi)003:258: spyi don rnam pa gsum du bka' stsal te /
NK051(zhi)003:260: bye brag gi dbye ba dang /
NK051(zhi)003:261: rang rang gi 'dod gzhung dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)003:262: de blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum la dgongs te gsungs pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:263: theg pa dgu ru gsungs pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:266: 'bring la gsum tha ma la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)003:268: blo tha ma gsum la mtshan nyid sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:269: blo 'bring po gsum la kri yog sde gsum bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:270: blo rab kyi tha ma la ma h+aa yo ga bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:271: rab kyi 'bring la a nu yo ga bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:272: rab kyi rab la a ti yo ga bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:274: theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)003:276: re re la gsum gsum phye ste dagu'o //
NK051(zhi)003:277: 'o na theg pa thams cad 'di ru bshad pa mi 'gal lam zhe na /
NK051(zhi)003:279: mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed //
NK051(zhi)003:281: mu stegs rtag chad du snang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)003:282: kun brtag rim dgu'i snang ba ni /
NK051(zhi)003:283: bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can //
NK051(zhi)003:285: nyan thos rdul phra rab tu snang ba bstan //
NK051(zhi)003:286: 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul //
NK051(zhi)003:288: rang rgyal ba'i theg pa ste /
NK051(zhi)003:289: rten 'brel bcu gnyis snang ba bstan //
NK051(zhi)003:290: bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas //
NK051(zhi)003:292: dbu ma dang sems tsam ste /
NK051(zhi)003:293: sems kyi snang ba tsam du bstan pa ste /
NK051(zhi)003:294: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:295: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs //
NK051(zhi)003:299: dag par byed cing sdig sel ba //
NK051(zhi)003:301: u pa ya'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:303: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
NK051(zhi)003:304: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
NK051(zhi)003:308: sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga' //
NK051(zhi)003:310: ma h+aa yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:312: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
NK051(zhi)003:314: a nu yo ga'i theg pa bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:315: thams cad lha dang lha mo'i snang bar 'dod /
NK051(zhi)003:316: ye shes sku ste rang byung ba //
NK051(zhi)003:317: khong nas byung ba skye ba med //
NK051(zhi)003:318: ces pa ni a ti yo ga'i theg pa ste /
NK051(zhi)003:319: rdzogs pa chen po chos nyid kyi snang bar 'dod /
NK051(zhi)003:320: don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don //
NK051(zhi)003:321: dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med //
NK051(zhi)003:322: skye med chos de sna tshogs ston //
NK051(zhi)003:323: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)003:324: tshigs su brjod pa spangs pa ste //
NK051(zhi)003:325: dper bya kun las 'das pa po //
NK051(zhi)003:326: thig le chen po yi ge med //
NK051(zhi)003:328: theg pa dgu'i rtse rgyal spyi phud spyi ti yo ga 'di bstan to //
NK051(zhi)003:329: rgyud dang mi 'gal theg pa bzhin du gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)003:330: da ni bye brag gi dbye ba 'chad de //
NK051(zhi)003:332: phyi pa mu stegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:333: nang pa sangs rgyas pa gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)003:334: phyi pa mu stegs pa la lta log gsum brgya drug cu /
NK051(zhi)003:335: de las bsdus pa 'jig tshogs kyi gnas ris nyi shu /
NK051(zhi)003:336: de las bsdus pa sde lnga /
NK051(zhi)003:337: de las bsdus pa rtag chad gnyis su shes par bya'o //
NK051(zhi)003:338: rtag pa la lta ba'i ri bo brgya dang bcu'o //
NK051(zhi)003:340: chad pa la mtha' la rtog pa nyi shu /
NK051(zhi)003:341: spyod pas dag par lta ba'o //
NK051(zhi)003:342: de la rtag pa ba na re /
NK051(zhi)003:347: ston pa 'od srung rdzogs byed na re /
NK051(zhi)003:349: nag po'i rnam par smin pa yang med zer /
NK051(zhi)003:350: bu ma skad rings bya ba na re /
NK051(zhi)003:351: sems can thams cad kyi lus 'di phyogs cha bdun du grub zer te /
NK051(zhi)003:353: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /
NK051(zhi)003:357: sems can thams cad las kyi dbang gis yang nas yang du 'khor ba yin zer /
NK051(zhi)003:359: lho'i sems can la sbyin pa btang ba dang /
NK051(zhi)003:360: byang gi sems can bsad pa mnyam /
NK051(zhi)003:361: sdig dang bsod nams bya ba drangs med zer /
NK051(zhi)003:362: b+ha wa na tu na re /
NK051(zhi)003:363: dmyal ba bsad na dmyal bar skye /
NK051(zhi)003:364: mi bsad na mi ru skye /
NK051(zhi)003:365: dper na sa bon gang btab dang 'dra zer /
NK051(zhi)003:366: ston pa gcer bu na re /
NK051(zhi)003:371: lha dbang phyug chen po bya ba gcig yod de /
NK051(zhi)003:372: de dga' na mtho ris su 'dren /
NK051(zhi)003:373: de ma dga' na ngan song du 'gro zer ro //
NK051(zhi)003:375: snying gi dkyil na che na sran ma tsam /
NK051(zhi)003:376: chung na nyung 'bru tsam gcig yod zer /
NK051(zhi)003:379: lus kyi tshad dang sbyar nas yod zer /
NK051(zhi)003:380: rgyu ru lta ba bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)003:381: sems can yang sus kyang ma byas /
NK051(zhi)003:383: nga byed pa po rgyu ru lta ste /
NK051(zhi)003:384: sran ma zlum po sus dril /
NK051(zhi)003:385: tsher ma rnon po sus gzhog /
NK051(zhi)003:386: dbang phyug rgyu ru lta ste /
NK051(zhi)003:387: lha la mchod pa legs na 'dis 'dren /
NK051(zhi)003:391: dus la bab na mi kheg zer te /
NK051(zhi)003:392: rtag pa'i ston pa shang ka dung 'dzin gsungs so //
NK051(zhi)003:393: de la chad pa'i ston pa 'bri ya bri ti zhes bya ba na re /
NK051(zhi)003:394: sems can thams cad glo bur ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)003:395: dang po skye ba'i tshul ni /
NK051(zhi)003:397: tshe snga ma 'dir song bya ba yang med /
NK051(zhi)003:398: phyi ma 'dir 'gro bya ba yang med /
NK051(zhi)003:407: me shi thal ba rlung khyer 'dra /
NK051(zhi)003:408: slar 'tsho ba ni ga la srid zer /
NK051(zhi)003:410: ma shi bar du ci bder spyod //
NK051(zhi)003:411: shi nas de yi spyod yul min //
NK051(zhi)003:412: 'jig rten 'di na ci dga' ci bde ba chos yin zer /
NK051(zhi)003:413: chad pa la dbye na gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)003:414: tshe snga phyi chad par 'dod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:415: skye ba snga ma 'di nas 'ongs bya ba yang med /
NK051(zhi)003:416: da phyi ma 'di ru 'gro bya ba yang med /
NK051(zhi)003:417: rkyen gyis glo bur du byung zer /
NK051(zhi)003:421: byung na su yang mi kheg zer /
NK051(zhi)003:426: mu stegs pa rtag par lta ba la /
NK051(zhi)003:427: sangs rgyas pa bdag stong rig tu 'dod pa khyad che /
NK051(zhi)003:429: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
NK051(zhi)003:430: mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed //
NK051(zhi)003:433: mu stegs dka' thub don med du spyod /
NK051(zhi)003:434: sangs rgyas pa byams snying rje'i sgo nas 'jug /
NK051(zhi)003:435: rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs gsog /
NK051(zhi)003:436: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs //
NK051(zhi)003:438: rten lha ni ma h+aa de ba la gsol /
NK051(zhi)003:439: sangs rgyas pa dkon mchog gsum mchod de /
NK051(zhi)003:440: gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa //
NK051(zhi)003:443: mu stegs log pa'i ston pa drug ste /
NK051(zhi)003:450: nang pa sangs rgyas pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:451: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa ste /
NK051(zhi)003:453: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
NK051(zhi)003:454: 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po //
NK051(zhi)003:456: phyi pa mu stegs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:457: nang pa sangs rgyas pa'i khyad mdo tsam bstan pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:458: da ni nang pa'i theg pa rim pa dgu'i bca' gzhi ston te /
NK051(zhi)003:459: de yang nyan thos la rnam pa gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)003:463: phyi'i yul 'di rdul phra rab gong bu gcig 'dus pa'i bdag nyid du 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)003:464: nang gi sems gang zag gi bdag med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:465: chos kyi bdag yod par 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)003:466: nyan thos bye brag pa'i lta ba ni /
NK051(zhi)003:467: phyi'i yul rdul phra rab reg la ma 'byar ba bskor ba dang bcas par 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)003:468: nang gi sems ni mdo sde pa dang mthun ces so //
NK051(zhi)003:469: rang sangs rgyas pa na re /
NK051(zhi)003:470: phyi'i yul 'di rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la /
NK051(zhi)003:471: dang po sa bon las myu gu /
NK051(zhi)003:477: 'bras bu las snying po dang ring pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:478: nang gi rten 'brel bcu gnyis ni /
NK051(zhi)003:479: dang po rgyu ma rig pa nas /
NK051(zhi)003:491: phyi'i rten 'brel lugs nas thon pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:493: phyi rten 'brel bcu gnyis su snang yang /
NK051(zhi)003:494: nang gi sems nyan thos pa ltar gang zag gi bdag med la /
NK051(zhi)003:495: chos kyi bdag dang bral ba'o //
NK051(zhi)003:496: rnam pa rig byed dang rig byed ma yin pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:498: theg pa chen po sems tsam pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:499: rang sangs rgyas pa ltar min te /
NK051(zhi)003:500: phyi yul du snang ba sems kyi snang ba yin te /
NK051(zhi)003:501: rnam par shes pa sgo nga gshag pa ltar 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)003:502: rnam rdzun shes pa bden par 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)003:503: snang ba dkar dmar gyi rnam par snang yang bden
NK051(zhi)003:504: pa shes pa'i ngo bor 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang
NK051(zhi)003:505: / sna tshogs gnyis med du 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)003:506: rnam pa'i grangs ji snyed yod pa shes pa'i grangs kyang de snyed du 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)003:507: tshogs brgyad du smra ba'i sems tsam dang /
NK051(zhi)003:508: tshogs gcig tu 'dod pa'i sems tsam dang bdun no //
NK051(zhi)003:509: de rnams hril gyis dril bas rnam bden dang rnam rdzun no //
NK051(zhi)003:510: rnam pa bden par 'dod pa'i sems tsam pa na re /
NK051(zhi)003:511: snang ba'i rnam pa ni sems kyi ngo bor bden la /
NK051(zhi)003:512: sems ni rang rig rang gsal gyi ngo bor bden par 'dod de /
NK051(zhi)003:513: rnam pa rdzun par 'dod pa na re /
NK051(zhi)003:514: rnam pa rdzun shes pa ni bden te /
NK051(zhi)003:518: mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang //
NK051(zhi)003:519: 'jig rten pa yi sems tsam mo //
NK051(zhi)003:520: sems ni yang dag dngos ma yin //
NK051(zhi)003:521: sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do //
NK051(zhi)003:522: zhes skad cig ma snga ma snga ma ni rgyu la /
NK051(zhi)003:523: phyi ma phyi ma ni 'bras bur 'dod do //
NK051(zhi)003:524: theg pa chen po dbu ma pa la bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)003:525: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma dang /
NK051(zhi)003:526: mdo sde spyod pa'i dbu ma dang /
NK051(zhi)003:527: dbu ma gzhung phyi mo dang /
NK051(zhi)003:529: de tsho yod tshad kyang mdor bsdu na bden pa gnyis te don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis so //
NK051(zhi)003:530: kun rdzob bden pa la gnyis te /
NK051(zhi)003:532: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob bo //
NK051(zhi)003:538: mu stegs kyi bdag lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)003:539: yang dag pa'i kun rdzob ni /
NK051(zhi)003:544: don dam pa'i bden pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:545: rnam grangs kyi don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:546: rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:547: rnam grangs kyi don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:548: spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang bral bar 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:549: rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:550: spros pa'i mtha' brgyad dang yang bral rang la yang mi gnas te /
NK051(zhi)003:552: da ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa kri ya'i 'dod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:553: phyi nang gi chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid yin pas /
NK051(zhi)003:554: don dam du yang rang bzhin med de /
NK051(zhi)003:555: kun rdzob tu yang rang bzhin med pa de rtogs pa'i byin rlabs las /
NK051(zhi)003:557: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
NK051(zhi)003:558: khrus dang gtsang sbra gtsor byed pa //
NK051(zhi)003:559: de phyir kri ya las kyi 'bras //
NK051(zhi)003:561: u pa yo ga la lta spyod gzhung tshugs med de /
NK051(zhi)003:562: gong 'og gi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
NK051(zhi)003:563: lta spyod gong 'og la rag las pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:564: rang gi 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:566: gnyis ka'i rgyud kyis 'dod pa ni //
NK051(zhi)003:567: lta spyod gong 'og rjes su mthun //
NK051(zhi)003:570: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad don dam par gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la /
NK051(zhi)003:571: kun rdzob gnyis su med pa'i byin rlabs las /
NK051(zhi)003:574: de nyid du sum cu rtsa bdun du snang ngo //
NK051(zhi)003:575: de yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
NK051(zhi)003:576: sdom pa tshul khrims bshags sbyangs dang /
NK051(zhi)003:577: nang gi rnal 'byor gtsor bya ba //
NK051(zhi)003:578: de phyir yo ga las kyi 'bras //
NK051(zhi)003:580: da ma h+aa yo ga'i 'dod pa ston te /
NK051(zhi)003:581: snang srid kyi chos thams cad rang gi sems yin la /
NK051(zhi)003:582: sems de snang ba mi 'gags pa thabs /
NK051(zhi)003:583: de rang bzhin med pa shes rab /
NK051(zhi)003:586: snang ba dang stong pa gnyis su med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:587: de yang sgyu 'phrul brgyad cu pa las /
NK051(zhi)003:588: snang ba mi 'gags thabs yin te //
NK051(zhi)003:589: rang bzhin med pa shes rab yin //
NK051(zhi)003:590: gnyis med zung du 'brel bas na //
NK051(zhi)003:591: rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas //
NK051(zhi)003:593: a nu yo ga'i 'dod pa ni /
NK051(zhi)003:594: yul gang snang ba snang la rang bzhin med pa ni chos kyi dbyings la /
NK051(zhi)003:595: shes pa ci skyes pa ni ye shes so //
NK051(zhi)003:597: shes pa ci skyes pa gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid la /
NK051(zhi)003:598: gnyis chos dang bral bar 'dod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:599: de yang rdo rje bkod pa las /
NK051(zhi)003:600: sa chu me rlung snod bcud las //
NK051(zhi)003:601: kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid de //
NK051(zhi)003:602: chos nyid don las gzhan med pas //
NK051(zhi)003:603: rang byung ye shes gsal ba la //
NK051(zhi)003:605: a ti yo ga'i 'dod pa la ni /
NK051(zhi)003:606: yul chos nyid kyi snang ba rang shar la /
NK051(zhi)003:610: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid du 'dod /
NK051(zhi)003:611: rig pa rang byung gi ye shes chen por 'dod /
NK051(zhi)003:614: theg pa dgu'i chos thams cad gsal bar bshad do //
NK051(zhi)003:615: spyir rgyud la bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK051(zhi)003:619: gsal ba nyi zla lta bu'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)003:620: zab pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i rgyud /
NK051(zhi)003:621: dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin po che lta bu'i rgyud de /
NK051(zhi)003:622: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /
NK051(zhi)003:623: nor bu chen po rin chen tog /
NK051(zhi)003:625: skye ba med pa sgra 'byung ba //
NK051(zhi)003:628: sgra de'i yi ge gzhan sgra ste /
NK051(zhi)003:629: a ni skye ba med pa'i sgra'o //
NK051(zhi)003:630: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)003:632: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa /
NK051(zhi)003:633: bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du //
NK051(zhi)003:634: sems can kun la bshad par 'tshal //
NK051(zhi)003:637: yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas //
NK051(zhi)003:639: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:640: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa //
NK051(zhi)003:642: dus phun sum tshogs pa bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:643: rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las //
NK051(zhi)003:645: bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan no //
NK051(zhi)003:646: da ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di la /
NK051(zhi)003:647: dbu zhabs su bsdus pa'i don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:649: sgra skad cham la dbab cing /
NK051(zhi)003:652: gzhung gi don rgyas par bshad pa dang gnyis /
NK051(zhi)003:653: mjug yongs su bsdus te bstan pa dang gsum mo //
NK051(zhi)003:654: klad kyi don la gsum ste /
NK051(zhi)003:655: rgya skad bod skad mtshams sbyar ba dang /
NK051(zhi)003:656: phun sum tshogs pa lnga bstan pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:658: gzhung gi don la skabs bcu bzhis bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:659: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)003:661: lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /
NK051(zhi)003:662: ces pa'i bar gyis tshigs bcad bcu drug gis ni zhus pa'i le'u bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:663: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)003:665: bcom ldan 'das ni legs zhes gsol //
NK051(zhi)003:666: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad drug gis slar gsungs pa'i le'u bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:667: de nas bcom ldan sh+aakya thub //
NK051(zhi)003:668: gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang //
NK051(zhi)003:670: rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas //
NK051(zhi)003:671: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis kyis ni /
NK051(zhi)003:672: rigs drug la gzigs pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:673: gsang sngags kyi rtsa ba gsungs pa'i le'u bstan to //
NK051(zhi)003:674: tshig gis bdag pos tshigs su bcad //
NK051(zhi)003:676: a ra pa tsa n+aa ya te na mah /
NK051(zhi)003:677: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gsum gyis /
NK051(zhi)003:678: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon par byang chub pa'i le'u bstan /
NK051(zhi)003:679: sangs rgyas dang sems can gyi gzhi bstan no //
NK051(zhi)003:682: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)003:683: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bcu bzhis /
NK051(zhi)003:684: rdo rje dbyings kyi sgo nas byang sems lag na rdo rje la bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:685: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
NK051(zhi)003:687: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
NK051(zhi)003:688: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig rkang gcig ma tshang pa'i tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa lngas /
NK051(zhi)003:689: chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas rnam pa snang mdzad la bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:692: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /
NK051(zhi)003:693: ces pa'i bar gyi tshig rkang gcig lhag pa'i tshigs bcad bcus /
NK051(zhi)003:694: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:695: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
NK051(zhi)003:697: ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal //
NK051(zhi)003:698: zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis /
NK051(zhi)003:699: so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:700: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste //
NK051(zhi)003:702: nor bu chen po rin chen tog ces pa'i bar
NK051(zhi)003:703: gyi tshig bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhis mnyam pa nyid
NK051(zhi)003:705: 'khrul pa log nas phyir mi ldog ste /
NK051(zhi)003:706: mthar phyin lus kyi mtha' rtogs /
NK051(zhi)003:708: sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ba //
NK051(zhi)003:710: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /
NK051(zhi)003:711: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad bco lngas /
NK051(zhi)003:712: bya ba nan tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:715: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
NK051(zhi)003:717: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
NK051(zhi)003:719: rigs lnga'i sgo nas ye shes lnga la bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:720: de ltar 'bras bu thob pa'i gding gis zin cing /
NK051(zhi)003:721: theg pa sna tshogs 'dus par bstan no //
NK051(zhi)003:722: lag na rdo rje 'chang ba nas /
NK051(zhi)003:723: chos kyi rgyal po thob bo //
NK051(zhi)003:724: zhes pas yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:727: d+har+m+aa d+h+aa tu dz+ny+aa na gar+b+ha +aah zhes pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad gnyis kyis /
NK051(zhi)003:728: sngags kyi sgo nas chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan to //
NK051(zhi)003:729: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK051(zhi)003:731: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad //
NK051(zhi)003:732: ces pa'i bar gyi tshigs bcad lngas ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas bstod pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:733: tshigs bcad brgya dang drug cu rtsa gnyis /
NK051(zhi)003:734: yon tan lnga bcu bzhugs so //
NK051(zhi)003:735: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i lo rgyus dang /
NK051(zhi)003:736: theg pa'i dbye ba sa bcad nye bar bsdus pa'i sgo nas bshad pa rdzogs so //
NK051(zhi)003:741: de la blo rab 'bring tha ma gsum las /
NK051(zhi)003:742: rab kyis thod rgal spyi ti yo ga 'di bstan te /
NK051(zhi)003:744: khyod kyi spyi ti bya ba 'di ga na yod /
NK051(zhi)003:746: chos gzhan dang yang mi mthun pa yin /
NK051(zhi)003:747: blos btags sam rdzun yin zer na /
NK051(zhi)003:748: nga yi spyi ti 'di min na //
NK051(zhi)003:749: yang ti nag po bya ba yang yod //
NK051(zhi)003:752: theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs pa'i phyir yin /
NK051(zhi)003:753: nga yi yin khyed kyis min zer /
NK051(zhi)003:754: theg pa sna tshogs su gsungs pa la khyod kyis yin na nga'i yang yin /
NK051(zhi)003:755: theg pa sna tshogs kyis khongs su nga'i yang ma shong ngam /
NK051(zhi)003:756: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang yin na /
NK051(zhi)003:759: yang na spyi ti yo ga gcig po bkol nas ma shong ngam /
NK051(zhi)003:760: theg pa gcig po der ma 'dus sam /
NK051(zhi)003:765: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
NK051(zhi)003:766: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
NK051(zhi)003:767: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
NK051(zhi)003:768: 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
NK051(zhi)003:770: khyed kyi theg pa dgu po bas kyang nga'i 'di zab ste /
NK051(zhi)003:771: khyod kyi theg pa'i dgongs pa yang dag pa /
NK051(zhi)003:772: nga'i spyi ti'i nang na yod do //
NK051(zhi)003:774: yin par ci yis shes zer na /
NK051(zhi)003:775: 'di gas shes byas la gong gi theg pa brjod do //
NK051(zhi)003:776: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can bya ba 'di /
NK051(zhi)003:777: gsang sngags gsar mar bshad na /
NK051(zhi)003:778: bcu drug ni shes rab ma /
NK051(zhi)003:781: phyed phyed ni yab yum gnyis kyi rdo rje dang pad+ma'o //
NK051(zhi)003:782: thig le ni byang chub sems kyi thig le'o //
NK051(zhi)003:783: thig zhes pa thabs dang shes rab bsrub pa las /
NK051(zhi)003:784: rdo rje ni nang gis bu ga'am /
NK051(zhi)003:785: khong rdo rje rtse mo nas /
NK051(zhi)003:786: byang chub sems kyi thig le la /
NK051(zhi)003:788: thig le de yum gyi pad+ma'i nang du ldan pas na can zhes bya'o //
NK051(zhi)003:792: btsal na gang gi ngo bor yang ma sgrub pa'i phyir yang /
NK051(zhi)003:794: mi la sgrubs pa'i gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir yang skye ba med pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:795: yang dag pa la gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:796: 'gags med snang mnyam pa'i rig pa bzhi ste /
NK051(zhi)003:797: shes pa tha dad med pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)003:798: snang ba la tha dad med do //
NK051(zhi)003:799: don dam pa'i bden pa la /
NK051(zhi)003:801: snang ba la tha dad med do //
NK051(zhi)003:802: bsam na snang du rlung ba'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)003:803: snang ba la tha dad med do //
NK051(zhi)003:805: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yod pa'i phyir /
NK051(zhi)003:806: snang ba la tha dad med pa'i yin no //
NK051(zhi)003:807: rdzogs pa chen po bsgom du yod pa dang /
NK051(zhi)003:808: bsgom du med pa zhes bya ba'i go ba ni 'di yin te /
NK051(zhi)003:809: bsgom du yod ces bya ba ni /
NK051(zhi)003:810: mtshan ma dang dbyibs su bcas te /
NK051(zhi)003:811: dngos po dang kha dog la bsgom pa ni ma yin gyi /
NK051(zhi)003:812: rdzogs pa chen po rang byung gi ye shes /
NK051(zhi)003:813: skye 'gags med pa'i don rtogs pa de la /
NK051(zhi)003:814: bsgom du rdul tsam yang med kyang /
NK051(zhi)003:815: yeng du skad cig tsam med de /
NK051(zhi)003:816: de la brtan pa thob dgos pas na /
NK051(zhi)003:818: de la mi bsgom pa bzhag med kyis don zhes /
NK051(zhi)003:821: sems nyid goms par bya ba las //
NK051(zhi)003:822: 'dres par bya ba rab tu gces //
NK051(zhi)003:823: bsgom du med ces bya ba'i go ba ni /
NK051(zhi)003:824: lta ba rtogs pas cho ga ste /
NK051(zhi)003:825: bsgom mi dgos bsgom pa thams cad rnam rtog gi klong du 'chor bas kyang bsgom mi dgos /
NK051(zhi)003:826: mtshan ma 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom du med /
NK051(zhi)003:827: gang snang yang 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom du med /
NK051(zhi)003:828: mnyam pa la bzhag rgyu byung na rtog pa yin pa'i phyir yang bsgom du med do //
NK051(zhi)003:829: dper na zhang blon ngo shes pa lta bu'o //
NK051(zhi)003:830: rtogs pa dang grol shar dus gcig ste /
NK051(zhi)003:831: rang byung ye shes ma btsal bar //
NK051(zhi)003:832: mtha' gnyis chos skur gsal ba'i phyir //
NK051(zhi)003:833: 'bras bu rtogs thob dus gcig pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:834: bsgom yod bsgom med kyi rnam par bzhag pa'o //
NK051(zhi)003:835: dam bca' dkrol ba'i gtan tshigs bzhi ni /
NK051(zhi)003:840: rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i chos thams cad stong manya ma du gtan la dbab /
NK051(zhi)003:841: blo ngo bo nyid du grol bas /
NK051(zhi)003:844: blo nyid gnyis med rang sar rang grol bar gtan la dbab /
NK051(zhi)003:846: snang stong tshig la snga phyi byung ba don du gcig ste /
NK051(zhi)003:847: snang stong gnyis su med pa gtan la dbab bo //
NK051(zhi)003:851: bkra shis gsal stong 'dzin med 'char bar shog //
